contents.text: Thank you for calling Mode Analytics in San Francisco, where we turn data into decisions.
For billing and account inquiries, press 1.
For questions about invoices and billing, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing specialists.

navigationGoals: I need clarification on a charge from last month’s invoice and a corrected billing statement.
I need to dispute a charge on my latest invoice.
I need to reconcile unexpected line-item fees on my latest invoice.
I’d like someone to explain my latest invoice charges to me.
I’d like to question a billing discrepancy I noticed on my recent student plan invoice.

contents.text: For changes to your subscription or account settings, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our account management team.

navigationGoals: I want to upgrade my subscription plan and update my billing information.
I want to change my subscription plan and update my payment method.
I want to adjust my account’s user-seat allocation and subscription tier.
I need to change my subscription plan and payment details.
I want to update my account to the annual student subscription package.

contents.text: For technical support and report assistance, press 2.
For help with creating reports and dashboards, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our reporting support team.

navigationGoals: I need help building a custom dashboard that shows our monthly sales metrics.
I need help creating a custom dashboard for tracking my unit’s readiness metrics.
I need help debugging a SQL-based chart in my dashboard report.
I want step-by-step help setting up a new report in Mode Analytics.
I need assistance designing a report dashboard to visualize my physics lab data.

contents.text: For data integration and API support, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our API support specialists.

navigationGoals: I need guidance setting up the Mode Analytics API to pull data from our Redshift warehouse.
I’m looking for assistance configuring the Mode Analytics API to integrate with our mission data feed.
I need assistance configuring the Mode API endpoint for real-time data ingestion.
I need assistance connecting Mode to my data source using the API.
I need support setting up the API to pull data from our simulation database.
